name: Janitor To The Rescue!
description:
Evil space robots have taken over the building.
All employees fled in panic without turning anything off. 

You take on the role of hard-core janitor Ed, whose job is to stop the waste of resources!
It's up to you to turn off the water and the electrical appliances!

A game developed for the Wasted Resources game jam. 
Check out the other games too! 
https://itch.io/jam/wastedresources

Music provided by DOS-88
DOS-88 Synthwave Music Library

Character Tiles provided by 
superpowers

Made with Godot
https://godotengine.org/license
